thread.title: Arsene Wenger to snub big-money China move? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers
thread.title_full: Arsene Wenger to snub big-money China move? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers

author: Football Spy
title: Arsene Wenger to snub big-money China move? Transfer news and gossip from Thursday's papers
text:
Arsenal manager Arsene Wenger (Photo: Stuart MacFarlane) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arsene Wenger will not be lured by a blockbuster offer from China in the summer. 
The Arsenal boss' contract is up in the summer and there is increased speculation he will not sign an extension. 
A move to China has been mooted for Wenger, where he would significantly enhance his current salary. 
But the Mail reports the Frenchman would prefer to remain with a top club in Europe. 
It remains to be seen if his future will be in north London. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
